caption.center: PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF MICHIGAN, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. MICHAEL ELLIS,

opinion.opinion_text:
SC: 127075, COA: 246709, Wayne CC: 01-007703-01.
On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the August 3, 2004 judgment of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court.
